definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The flag was flapping about in the light wind.
sentences.chinese: 那面旗子在微風中飄動。

sentences.english: Long flowing locks, but his face and body hairless.
sentences.chinese: 一縷縷飄動的長髮，但是臉部和身體卻沒有毛髮。

sentences.english: A cloak of raven feathers fluttered from his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 渡鴉羽毛的斗篷在肩頭上順風飄動。

sentences.english: Fenbo Department of the waves, in the face of the expressions solidification.
sentences.chinese: 長髮和脖頸處的粉白紗巾飄動着，臉上的表情凝固着。

sentences.english: The red flags were riffled by the breeze.

sentences.chinese: 絲帶飄動着，小巧的布鞋。

sentences.english: Our Five-Starred Red Flag is riffling in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 我們的五星紅旗在微風中飄動。

sentences.english: The leaves drift in the storm.
She twirls around to show how the skirt moves.
sentences.chinese: 她旋轉身軀來顯示裙子如何飄動。

sentences.english: A small flag fluttered in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 一面小旗在微風中飄動。

sentences.english: The flags were dancing in the breeze.
Her topsails and flying kites had a faint glow upon them where the dawn caught them.
sentences.chinese: 上桅帆和迎風飄動的輕帆映着晨曦的微光。

sentences.english: Her hair ripples in the spring breeze.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮在春風中像波浪般飄動。

sentences.english: The flag was flapping about in the wind.
Hair and neck scarf Fenbo Department of the waves, in the face of the expressions solidification.
sentences.chinese: 長髮和脖頸處的粉白紗巾飄動着，臉上的表情凝固着。

sentences.english: "This shear layer flaps and up and down like a flag in the wind, " Rowley said.
sentences.chinese: 這一剪切層像風中的旗幟一樣上下飄動。

definition: to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
